name: Smokin’ BBQ Sauce
preparation: In a Multipurpose Pot, combine mix, ketchup, apple sauce, and water.
Partially cover; over medium heat, cook sauce 15 min for flavours to blend. Stir often.
Liberally brush sauce on grilled meat near the end of cooking. Refrigerate sauce up to 1 week.
tips: Make a wet rub! Simply combine mix with 1⁄4 cup oil and 2 tbsp apple cider vinegar. Massage to coat 2 lbs (900 g) boneless, skinless chicken or pork. Let stand for 10 min, then grill.
